name: ZEFRO
description:
-°- Info -°-
Fast paced top down racer game for GBJAM-5
Try to collect all boost pad for a new record!

-°- Controls -°-
arrow up / XBox (A) = acceleration
arrow left / XBox D-Pad Left = left
arrow right / XBox D-Pad right = right
1, 2 and 3 = change resolution

-°- Team -°-
puppetmaster - programming, art, animation, soundfx
dark3zz - music

Created with Godot Engine

-°- Version -°-
1.1.2
- remove ship shadow (forgot to change the color)
- fix speed after dead
- add dead animations
- change top-layer of track BLUE (clouds)
- add new curve to track BLUE
- add posibility to change the resolution
